targets.rawSql:
select 
  count(*) as value
from issues i
  join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
where 
  i.type in ($type)
  and i.status != 'DONE'
  and bi.board_id in ($board_id)

SELECT DISTINCT 
--  si.issue_key as JiraTicket,
--  si.status as Status,
  ti.issue_key as Epic,
  ti.title as Bezeichnung,
  ti.status as Status
FROM
  issues si
  left join issue_relationships ir on ir.source_issue_id = si.id
  left join issues ti on ir.target_issue_id = ti.id
  left JOIN board_issues bi ON si.id = bi.issue_id
WHERE
  si.type in ($type)
  AND bi.board_id in ($board_id)
  and (ti.issue_key like 'CTP%' or ti.issue_key like 'NLP%' or ti.issue_key like 'FIP%' or ti.issue_key like 'FIP%' or ti.issue_key like 'LPMSC%')
  and ti.status in ('TODO', 'IN_PROGRESS')
ORDER BY ti.status

Select 
 epic_issues.source_epicissue_count as 'Anzahl Epic Features',
 non_epic_issues.source_non_epicissue_count as 'Anzahl non Epic Features'
 FROM (
SELECT 
    COUNT(si.issue_key) AS source_epicissue_count
FROM 
  issues si
  left join issue_relationships ir on ir.source_issue_id = si.id
  left join issues ti on ir.target_issue_id = ti.id
  left JOIN board_issues bi ON si.id = bi.issue_id
WHERE
  si.type in ($type)
--  AND $__timeFilter(si.created_date)
  AND bi.board_id in ($board_id)
  and (ti.issue_key like 'CTP%' or ti.issue_key like 'NLP%' or ti.issue_key like 'FIP%' or ti.issue_key like 'LPMSC%')
  AND si.status = 'TODO'
) as epic_issues
JOIN (SELECT
    COUNT(DISTINCT si.issue_key) AS source_non_epicissue_count
FROM 
issues si
  left JOIN board_issues bi ON si.id = bi.issue_id
WHERE
  si.type in ($type)
--  AND $__timeFilter(si.created_date)
  AND bi.board_id in ($board_id)
  AND si.issue_key NOT IN (
    SELECT
  si.issue_key as JiraTicket
FROM
  issues si
  left join issue_relationships ir on ir.source_issue_id = si.id
  left join issues ti on ir.target_issue_id = ti.id
  left JOIN board_issues bi ON si.id = bi.issue_id
WHERE
  si.type in ($type)
--  AND $__timeFilter(si.created_date)
  AND bi.board_id in ($board_id)
  and (ti.issue_key like 'CTP%' or ti.issue_key like 'NLP%' or ti.issue_key like 'FIP%' or ti.issue_key like 'LPMSC%')
)
  AND si.status = 'TODO'
) as non_epic_issues
;

panels.title: Backlog Epic vs. non Epic Features

targets.rawSql:
Select 
 epic_issues.source_epicissue_count as 'Anzahl Epic Features',
 non_epic_issues.source_non_epicissue_count as 'Anzahl non Epic Features'
 FROM (
SELECT 
    COUNT(si.issue_key) AS source_epicissue_count
FROM 
  issues si
  left join issue_relationships ir on ir.source_issue_id = si.id
  left join issues ti on ir.target_issue_id = ti.id
  left JOIN board_issues bi ON si.id = bi.issue_id
WHERE
  si.type in ($type)
--  AND $__timeFilter(si.created_date)
  AND bi.board_id in ($board_id)
  and (ti.issue_key like 'CTP%' or ti.issue_key like 'NLP%' or ti.issue_key like 'FIP%' or ti.issue_key like 'FIP%' or ti.issue_key like 'LPMSC%')
  AND si.status = 'IN_PROGRESS'
) as epic_issues
JOIN (SELECT
    COUNT(DISTINCT si.issue_key) AS source_non_epicissue_count
FROM 
issues si
  left JOIN board_issues bi ON si.id = bi.issue_id
WHERE
  si.type in ($type)
--  AND $__timeFilter(si.created_date)
  AND bi.board_id in ($board_id)
  AND si.issue_key NOT IN (
    SELECT
  si.issue_key as JiraTicket
FROM
  issues si
  left join issue_relationships ir on ir.source_issue_id = si.id
  left join issues ti on ir.target_issue_id = ti.id
  left JOIN board_issues bi ON si.id = bi.issue_id
WHERE
  si.type in ($type)
--  AND $__timeFilter(si.created_date)
  AND bi.board_id in ($board_id)
  and (ti.issue_key like 'CTP%' or ti.issue_key like 'NLP%' or ti.issue_key like 'FIP%' or ti.issue_key like 'LPMSC%')
)
  AND si.status = 'IN_PROGRESS'
) as non_epic_issues
;

panels.title: In Progress Epic vs. non Epic Features

targets.rawSql:
select 
  count(*) as value
from issues i
  join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
where 
  i.type in ($type)
  and i.status = 'DONE'
  and $__timeFilter(i.resolution_date)
  and bi.board_id in ($board_id)

SELECT
  DATE(i.resolution_date - INTERVAL DAY(i.resolution_date)-1 DAY) as time,
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN status = 'DONE' THEN i.id ELSE NULL END) as "Number of Delivered Issues"
FROM issues i
  JOIN board_issues bi ON i.id = bi.issue_id
WHERE 
  i.type in ($type)
  AND $__timeFilter(i.resolution_date)
  AND bi.board_id in ($board_id)
GROUP BY time

panels.title: Nr. of Features Done pro Monat (Velocity)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  issue_key as JiraTicket,
  resolution_date as ResolutionDate,
  lead_time_minutes/1440 as LeadTimeDays,
  story_point
FROM
  issues i
  JOIN board_issues bi ON i.id = bi.issue_id
WHERE
  i.type in ($type)
  AND i.status = 'DONE'
  AND $__timeFilter(i.resolution_date)
  AND bi.board_id in ($board_id)
ORDER BY resolution_date desc

Select 
 epic_issues.source_epicissue_count as 'Anzahl Epic Features',
 non_epic_issues.source_non_epicissue_count as 'Anzahl non Epic Features'
 FROM (
SELECT 
    COUNT(si.issue_key) AS source_epicissue_count
FROM 
  issues si
  left join issue_relationships ir on ir.source_issue_id = si.id
  left join issues ti on ir.target_issue_id = ti.id
  left JOIN board_issues bi ON si.id = bi.issue_id
WHERE
  si.type in ($type)
  AND $__timeFilter(si.resolution_date)
  AND bi.board_id in ($board_id)
  and (ti.issue_key like 'CTP%' or ti.issue_key like 'NLP%' or ti.issue_key like 'FIP%' or ti.issue_key like 'LPMSC%')
  AND si.status = 'DONE'
) as epic_issues
JOIN (SELECT
    COUNT(DISTINCT si.issue_key) AS source_non_epicissue_count
FROM 
issues si
  left JOIN board_issues bi ON si.id = bi.issue_id
WHERE
  si.type in ($type)
  AND $__timeFilter(si.resolution_date)
  AND bi.board_id in ($board_id)
  AND si.issue_key NOT IN (
    SELECT
  si.issue_key as JiraTicket
FROM
  issues si
  left join issue_relationships ir on ir.source_issue_id = si.id
  left join issues ti on ir.target_issue_id = ti.id
  left JOIN board_issues bi ON si.id = bi.issue_id
WHERE
  si.type in ($type)
  AND $__timeFilter(si.resolution_date)
  AND bi.board_id in ($board_id)
  and (ti.issue_key like 'CTP%' or ti.issue_key like 'NLP%' or ti.issue_key like 'FIP%' or ti.issue_key like 'LPMSC%')
)
  AND si.status = 'DONE'
) as non_epic_issues
;

Select 
 COALESCE(epic_issues.time, non_epic_issues.time) as time,
 epic_issues.source_epicissue_count,
 non_epic_issues.source_non_epicissue_count
 FROM (
SELECT 
    DATE(si.resolution_date - INTERVAL DAY(si.resolution_date)-1 DAY) as time,
    COUNT(si.issue_key) AS source_epicissue_count
FROM 
  issues si
  left join issue_relationships ir on ir.source_issue_id = si.id
  left join issues ti on ir.target_issue_id = ti.id
  left JOIN board_issues bi ON si.id = bi.issue_id
WHERE
  si.type in ($type)
  AND $__timeFilter(si.resolution_date)
  AND bi.board_id in ($board_id)
  and (ti.issue_key like 'CTP%' or ti.issue_key like 'NLP%' or ti.issue_key like 'FIP%' or ti.issue_key like 'LPMSC%')
  and si.status = 'DONE'
GROUP BY 
    time
) as epic_issues
right JOIN (SELECT
    DATE(si.resolution_date - INTERVAL DAY(si.resolution_date)-1 DAY) as time,
    COUNT(DISTINCT si.issue_key) AS source_non_epicissue_count
FROM 
    issues si
  left JOIN board_issues bi ON si.id = bi.issue_id
WHERE
  si.type in ($type)
  AND $__timeFilter(si.resolution_date)
  AND bi.board_id in ($board_id)
  and si.status = 'DONE'
  AND si.issue_key NOT IN (
    SELECT
  si.issue_key as JiraTicket
FROM
  issues si
  left join issue_relationships ir on ir.source_issue_id = si.id
  left join issues ti on ir.target_issue_id = ti.id
  left JOIN board_issues bi ON si.id = bi.issue_id
WHERE
  si.type in ($type)
  AND $__timeFilter(si.resolution_date)
  AND bi.board_id in ($board_id)
  and (ti.issue_key like 'CTP%' or ti.issue_key like 'NLP%' or ti.issue_key like 'FIP%' or ti.issue_key like 'LPMSC%')
  and si.status = 'DONE'
)
GROUP BY 
    time
) as non_epic_issues
on epic_issues.time = non_epic_issues.time
;

panels.title: Verteilung Done Features (Epic vs. non Epic)

targets.rawSql:
select 
  avg(lead_time_minutes/1440) as value
from issues i
  join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
where 
  i.type in ($type)
  and i.status = 'DONE'
  and $__timeFilter(i.resolution_date)
  and bi.board_id in ($board_id)

panels.title: Durchnittliche Lead Time Features [ Features done im ausgwählten Zeitraum]

targets.rawSql:
with _requirements as(
  select 
    DATE_ADD(date(i.resolution_date), INTERVAL -DAYOFMONTH(date(i.resolution_date))+1 DAY) as time,
    avg(lead_time_minutes/1440) as mean_lead_time
  from issues i
    join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
  where 
    i.type in ($type)
    and i.status = 'DONE'
    and $__timeFilter(i.resolution_date)
    and bi.board_id in ($board_id)
  group by 1
)

select 
  date_format(time,'%M %Y') as month,
  mean_lead_time
from _requirements
order by time asc

panels.title: Durchnittliche Lead Time Features [ Features done im ausgwählten Zeitraum]

targets.rawSql:
with _ranks as(
  select 
    i.lead_time_minutes,
    percent_rank() over (order by lead_time_minutes asc) as ranks
  from issues i
    join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
  where 
    i.type in ($type)
    and i.status = 'DONE'
    and $__timeFilter(i.resolution_date)
    and bi.board_id in ($board_id)
)

select
  max(lead_time_minutes/1440) as value
from _ranks
where 
  ranks <= 0.8

panels.title: 80% Feature Lead Time sind weniger als # Tage[Features Done im ausgwählten Zeitraum]

targets.rawSql:
WITH ReleaseDates AS (
    SELECT 
        issue_id, 
        field_value AS releasedate,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY issue_id ORDER BY field_value) AS rn
    FROM 
        issue_custom_array_fields
    WHERE 
        field_id = 'x_releasedate'
        -- Filtere nur die Einträge für Release-Daten
       
)
SELECT 
    MIN(r.releasedate) AS releasedate,
    -- Bestimme das früheste Release-Datum
    SUM(CASE WHEN i.resolution_date <= r.releasedate THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS abgeschlossen_count,
    -- Zähle die Anzahl der rechtzeitig abgeschlossenen Issues
    SUM(CASE WHEN i.resolution_date > r.releasedate THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ueberlaeufer_abgeschlossen_count,
    -- Zähle die Anzahl der Überläufer (später abgeschlossen als geplant)
    SUM(CASE WHEN i.resolution_date IS NULL AND CURRENT_DATE > r.releasedate THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ueberlaeufer_offen_count
    -- Zähle die Anzahl der offenen Überläufer (kein Abschlussdatum und Release-Datum ist vergangen)
FROM 
    issues i
JOIN 
    ReleaseDates r ON i.id = r.issue_id
    -- Verbinde die Release-Daten mit der Issues-Tabelle
LEFT JOIN 
    board_issues bi ON i.id = bi.issue_id
    -- Optionale Verbindung mit der Board-Issues-Tabelle
WHERE
    bi.board_id IN ($board_id)
    -- Filtere nach spezifischen Board-IDs
     and r.releasedate < CURRENT_DATE
GROUP BY 
    r.releasedate
    -- Gruppiere die Ergebnisse nach Release-Datum
ORDER BY 
    MIN(r.releasedate) asc;
    -- Sortiere die Ergebnisse nach dem frühesten Release-Datum

WITH ReleaseDates AS (
    SELECT 
        issue_id, 
        field_value AS releasedate,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY issue_id ORDER BY field_value) AS rn
    FROM 
        issue_custom_array_fields
    WHERE 
        field_id = 'x_releasedate'
        -- Filtere nur die Einträge für Release-Daten
)
SELECT 
    MIN(r.releasedate) AS releasedate,
    -- Bestimme das früheste Release-Datum
    COUNT(i.id) AS issue_count,
    -- Zähle die Anzahl der Issues pro Release-Datum
    SUM(CASE WHEN i.resolution_date <= r.releasedate THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS abgeschlossen_count,
    -- Zähle die Anzahl der rechtzeitig abgeschlossenen Issues
    SUM(CASE WHEN i.resolution_date > r.releasedate THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ueberlaeufer_abgeschlossen_count,
    -- Zähle die Anzahl der Überläufer (später abgeschlossen als geplant)
    SUM(CASE WHEN i.resolution_date IS NULL AND CURRENT_DATE > r.releasedate THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ueberlaeufer_offen_count
    -- Zähle die Anzahl der offenen Überläufer (kein Abschlussdatum und Release-Datum ist vergangen)
FROM 
    issues i
JOIN 
    ReleaseDates r ON i.id = r.issue_id
    -- Verbinde die Release-Daten mit der Issues-Tabelle
LEFT JOIN 
    board_issues bi ON i.id = bi.issue_id
    -- Optionale Verbindung mit der Board-Issues-Tabelle
WHERE
    bi.board_id IN ($board_id)
    -- Filtere nach spezifischen Board-IDs
GROUP BY 
    r.releasedate
    -- Gruppiere die Ergebnisse nach Release-Datum
ORDER BY 
    MIN(r.releasedate) DESC;
    -- Sortiere die Ergebnisse nach dem frühesten Release-Datum

WITH ReleaseDates AS (
    SELECT 
        issue_id, 
        field_value AS releasedate
    FROM 
        issue_custom_array_fields
    WHERE 
        field_id = 'x_releasedate'
        -- Filtere nur die Einträge für Release-Daten
)
SELECT 
    i.issue_key,
    i.resolution_date,
    r.releasedate
FROM 
    issues i
JOIN 
    ReleaseDates r ON i.id = r.issue_id
    -- Verbinde die Release-Daten mit der Issues-Tabelle
LEFT JOIN 
    board_issues bi ON i.id = bi.issue_id
    -- Optionale Verbindung mit der Board-Issues-Tabelle
WHERE
    bi.board_id IN ($board_id)
    -- Filtere nach spezifischen Board-IDs
ORDER BY 
    r.releasedate, i.issue_key;
    -- Sortiere die Ergebnisse nach Release-Datum und Issue-Key

list.definition: select concat(name, '--', id) from boards where id like 'jira%' and  name like 'ART%'
list.label: Choose Board
list.name: board_id
list.query: select concat(name, '--', id) from boards where id like 'jira%' and  name like 'ART%'

list.definition: select distinct type from issues limit 50
list.label: Issue Type
list.name: type
list.query: select distinct type from issues limit 50
